room_title: Escape room "Redemption" by Solve It... Escape Rooms in Vernon
review: Our family did the Redemption room today and had an amazing time! We have done a lot of escape rooms and this one was, by far, one of the best - good challenge, great clues, and always kept us guessing. So wonderful to have this in Vernon - we highly, highly recommend it to everyone! And we will be coming back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Redemption" by Solve It... Escape Rooms in Vernon
review: The Redemption room was fantastic! Very challenging, well planned out! Loved it! Vernon finally has a great, fun place to go!

room_title: Escape room "Redemption" by Solve It... Escape Rooms in Vernon
review: Had a really great time! Redemption was challenging and with the help clues given, we were able to escape with 3 minutes to spare! Will definitely go back to try the other room!
